projects.label: Do the Lawn
projects.description: A chore-based chaos simulator game. Developed in Unreal Engine 4.

projects.label: Project Gradual
projects.description: A 3D racing game inspired by anti-gravity racers of the 90's. Developed in Unreal Engine 4 using C++ in Visual Studio.

projects.label: Caveman Works a 9-5
projects.description: A new game I'm in the process of creating in C# with Unity. Check back later for more updates!

projects.label: Manorbound
projects.description: A 3D horror game where 1-4 players have to go around solving puzzles in order to solve the mystery of the haunted manor. Developed in Unreal Engine 4.
